## FromFlexibleExtension type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FromFlexibleExtension<GValue extends FlexibleExtension<any>> = GValue extends PrioritizedExtension<infer P> ? P : GValue extends AnyExtension ? GValue : never;
```
